languages.text: "Мои "предположения" — это секретные сведения Инквизиции, которые я не могу разглашать без веской причины. Если появятся улики, подтверждающие мои опасения, то я сообщу все необходимое. Если же я напрасно тревожусь, то не хотелось бы делиться опасными для вас знаниями напрасно".

traits.locale_text: "Мои "предположения" — это секретные сведения Инквизиции, которые я не могу разглашать без веской причины. Если появятся улики, подтверждающие мои опасения, то я сообщу все необходимое. Если же я напрасно тревожусь, то не хотелось бы делиться опасными для вас знаниями напрасно".

languages.text: "My 'theories' are classified information of the Inquisition that I cannot divulge without good reason. If evidence comes to light that confirms my fears, I will disclose everything necessary. If, however, my concern is baseless, I would not wish to share knowledge dangerous to you without cause."
languages.original_text: "Мои "предположения" — это секретные сведения Инквизиции, которые я не могу разглашать без веской причины. Если появятся улики, подтверждающие мои опасения, то я сообщу все необходимое. Если же я напрасно тревожусь, то не хотелось бы делиться опасными для вас знаниями напрасно".

traits.locale_text: "My 'suspicions' are classified information of the Inquisition that I cannot divulge without good reason. If evidence comes to light that confirms my fears, I will disclose everything necessary. If, however, my concern is baseless, I would not wish to share knowledge dangerous to you without cause."

"My 'suspicions' are classified information of the Inquisition that I cannot divulge without good reason. If evidence comes to light that confirms my fears, I will disclose everything necessary. If, however, my concern is baseless, I would not wish to share knowledge dangerous to you without cause."

"My 'suspicions' are classified information of the Inquisition that I cannot divulge without good reason. If evidence comes to light that confirms my fears, I will disclose everything necessary. If, however, my concern is baseless, I would not wish to share knowledge dangerous to you without cause."

"My 'theories' are classified information of the Inquisition that I cannot divulge without good reason. If evidence comes to light that confirms my fears, I will disclose everything necessary. If, however, my concern is baseless, I would not wish to share knowledge dangerous to you without cause."

"My 'theories' are classified information of the Inquisition that I cannot divulge without good reason. If evidence comes to light that confirms my fears, I will disclose everything necessary. If, however, my concern is baseless, I would not wish to share knowledge dangerous to you without cause."

languages.text: “我掌握的情报，是审判庭的机密信息，没有充分的理由绝对不能泄露。如果我们找到了证据，能够证实我的担忧，那我会对一切必要的信息直言不讳。不过，如果我的担心毫无根据，那我不会毫无理由地分享会给你带来危险的知识。”
languages.original_text: "My 'theories' are classified information of the Inquisition that I cannot divulge without good reason. If evidence comes to light that confirms my fears, I will disclose everything necessary. If, however, my concern is baseless, I would not wish to share knowledge dangerous to you without cause."

traits.locale_text: “我掌握的情报，是审判庭的机密信息，没有充分的理由绝对不能泄露。如果我们找到了证据，能够证实我的担忧，那我会对一切必要的信息直言不讳。不过，如果我的担心毫无根据，那我不会毫无理由地分享会给你带来危险的知识。”

languages.text: «Mis "teorías" son información confidencial de la Inquisición que no tengo libertad de divulgar sin un buen motivo. Si salieran a la luz pruebas que confirmasen mis temores, revelaría cuanto fuese menester. Pero si mis preocupaciones son infundadas, prefiero no desvelar un conocimiento que podría resultar peligroso para usted».
languages.original_text: "My 'theories' are classified information of the Inquisition that I cannot divulge without good reason. If evidence comes to light that confirms my fears, I will disclose everything necessary. If, however, my concern is baseless, I would not wish to share knowledge dangerous to you without cause."

traits.locale_text: «Mis "teorías" son información confidencial de la Inquisición que no tengo libertad de divulgar sin un buen motivo. Si salieran a la luz pruebas que confirmasen mis temores, revelaría cuanto fuese menester. Pero si mis preocupaciones son infundadas, prefiero no desvelar un conocimiento que podría resultar peligroso para usted».

languages.text: 「私の仮説は異端審問庁の機密情報であり、正当な理由がない限り明かすことはできません。私の懸念を裏付ける証拠が明るみに出れば、必要なことはすべて開示します。しかし、私の懸念が根拠のないものであったとしても、理由なくあなたにとって危険な知識を共有したくはありません」
languages.original_text: "My 'theories' are classified information of the Inquisition that I cannot divulge without good reason. If evidence comes to light that confirms my fears, I will disclose everything necessary. If, however, my concern is baseless, I would not wish to share knowledge dangerous to you without cause."

traits.locale_text: 「私の仮説は異端審問庁の機密情報であり、正当な理由がない限り明かすことはできません。私の懸念を裏付ける証拠が明るみに出れば、必要なことはすべて開示します。しかし、私の懸念が根拠のないものであったとしても、理由なくあなたにとって危険な知識を共有したくはありません」

languages.text: "Meine 'Theorien' sind geheime Informationen der Inquisition, die ich nicht ohne guten Grund weitergeben darf. Sollten sich Beweise für meine Befürchtungen finden, werde ich Euch alles Nötige sagen. Sollten meine Bedenken allerdings unbegründet sein, möchte ich Euch nicht grundlos gefährlichem Wissen aussetzen."
languages.original_text: "My 'theories' are classified information of the Inquisition that I cannot divulge without good reason. If evidence comes to light that confirms my fears, I will disclose everything necessary. If, however, my concern is baseless, I would not wish to share knowledge dangerous to you without cause."

traits.locale_text: "Meine 'Theorien' sind geheime Informationen der Inquisition, die ich nicht ohne guten Grund weitergeben darf. Sollten sich Beweise für meine Befürchtungen finden, werde ich Euch alles Nötige sagen. Sollten meine Bedenken allerdings unbegründet sein, möchte ich Euch nicht grundlos gefährlichem Wissen aussetzen."

languages.text: « Mes "théories" sont en réalité des renseignements confidentiels de l'Inquisition qu'il m'est interdit de divulguer sauf cas de force de majeure. Si des preuves viennent confirmer mes craintes, je vous révélerai le strict nécessaire. En revanche, si mes soupçons s'avèrent infondés, je préfère éviter de vous mettre en danger en vous communiquant des informations aussi sensibles. »
languages.original_text: "My 'theories' are classified information of the Inquisition that I cannot divulge without good reason. If evidence comes to light that confirms my fears, I will disclose everything necessary. If, however, my concern is baseless, I would not wish to share knowledge dangerous to you without cause."

traits.locale_text: « Mes "théories" sont en réalité des renseignements confidentiels de l'Inquisition qu'il m'est interdit de divulguer sauf cas de force de majeure. Si des preuves viennent confirmer mes craintes, je vous révélerai le strict nécessaire. En revanche, si mes soupçons s'avèrent infondés, je préfère éviter de vous mettre en danger en vous communiquant des informations aussi sensibles. »

languages.text: "Benim 'teorilerim', Engizisyon'un gizli bilgilerine dâhildir. İyi bir sebebim olmadığı takdirde onları ortaya dökemem. Açığa çıkan kanıtlar endişelerimi haklı çıkarırsa gerekli olan her şeyi paylaşacağım. Fakat kaygılarımın herhangi bir temeli yoksa sana zarar verecek bilgileri sebepsiz yere paylaşmak istemem."
languages.original_text: "My 'theories' are classified information of the Inquisition that I cannot divulge without good reason. If evidence comes to light that confirms my fears, I will disclose everything necessary. If, however, my concern is baseless, I would not wish to share knowledge dangerous to you without cause."
